title: "Beyond work"

Outside of coding, research, and leadership roles, I value time spent on activities that help me disconnect and stay creative.

<!--more-->

I enjoy playing the guitar, discovering new music, and, occasionally, a good beer.  
Music plays an important role in my life, and my taste is deliberately eclectic, spanning different genres, cultures, and periods.
